thread.section_title: Paypal Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paypal | www.paypal.com
thread.title: Daniel Nagy

author: Daniel Nagy
title: Daniel Nagy
text: Your bank account gets charged when trying to pay by credit card, or if you successfully change to your credit card by reading all the small print, they will charge you using their extortionate forecast fees, without even giving you the option to pay in the original currency during checkout. You need to read tons of small print to be able to use the service without getting ripped off
